title: British and Irish Lions: Test your knowledge by taking our quiz! | Rugby Union News | Sky Sports
text:
British and Irish Lions: Test your knowledge by taking our quiz! Last Updated: 22/02/17 7:19pm It's 100 days until the British and Irish Lions begin their tour of New Zealand! 
The 2017 British & Irish Lions will kick off their tour to New Zealand on June 3 when they take on a Provincial Union XV at the Toll Stadium in Whangarei. 
The last time the Lions toured New Zealand, 12 years ago, they were beaten 3-0 in the Test matches. They return this year looking to get revenge and build on their 2013 Test series win against Australia. 
Lions talk has already started in earnest but how well do you know your British and Irish Lions history? 
Test your knowledge by taking our quiz!
